Boston Scally: Lovely day for a Guinness! NEW: The 'Guinness Gilroy' Patchwork cap is NOW AVAILABLE! 

SHOP NOW: bostonscally.attn.tv/aZTBwdPxy5bw
Boston Scally: Hi! If you need additional help please reach us at info@bostonscally.com. Text STOP to opt out.
I ordered it and accidentally put wrong address what can I do
Boston Scally: Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear that. The best way to check if you can cancel or edit your order is to email our support team directly at info@bostonscally.com.
I've done that haven't gotten a reply

Boston Scally: Thanks for letting me know, and sorry about that. Our team is dealing with a high volume of emails, which can sometimes slow response times. Rest assured, our team is reviewing your message and will get back to you as soon as possible. We appreciate your continued patience!

Loverboy: Hey , this is Jordan. Thanks for checking out our site! ðŸ˜Š https://loverboy.attn.tv/aa0N1F0ABm-D 

Any questions I can answer for you?
I have not been ableTo find loverboy in any locations near me.  Can it only be ordered online and shipped?   Any restrictions delivering to Pennsylvania?

Loverboy: Thank you for reaching out, and I'm sorry to hear that! I'll pass your feedback to our team for future improvement.

Yes, Loverboy drinks can be ordered online and shipped directly to you. Delivery requires a signature from someone 21 or older at a residential address, we cannot ship to pickup locations, P.O. boxes, or business addresses. We do not have specific shipping restrictions for Pennsylvania. Hope this helps! If you have any questions, feel free to text me.
